headline: Entergy (ETR) Breaks Ground on Louisiana Power Plants
summary: Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR) is included among the 11 Energy Stocks to Buy for a Retirement Portfolio. Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR) is an integrated energy company that provides electricity to 3 million utility customers in Arkansas, Louisiana, Mississippi, and Texas. headline: Is Entergy Stock Outperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: Entergy has outpaced the Nasdaq Composite over the past year, with analysts maintaining a moderately positive outlook on the stock’s future performance.
